classification: Woodwork; Tools, Equipment and Utilitarian Objects
creditline: Gift of Guy and Loes van Rijn
description: saddle with high front and back; front has three-pronged antler-like motif; bullet-shaped backrest with pointed prong on top; back of backrest and front of front element decorated with cut and appliqued leather and cloth strips forming bands and bars with triangle designs and X's in red, green and brown; applied tan animal hide with short fur on front, back and around bottom of seat; seat and bottom are brown leather with black pigment linear designs
medium: Wood, leather, metal, animal hide, pigments, cloth
title: Camel saddle
